raw: Coronavirus: 17 new infections confirmed in Hong Kong with 20 more people testing positive .

raw: Hong Kong recorded 17 new coronavirus cases on Saturday , with 20 more people testing positive , including a 20 - month - old child .
replaced: Hong Kong recorded The new cases on Saturday , with 20 more people testing positive , including The toddler .
